last_episode_to_air.name: Brownstone Milestone
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ryan and Emilia pack their condo and feel nostalgic; as the renovation comes to an end, the team of top interior designers installs the new custom furnishings

name: Million Dollar Listing: Ryan's Renovation
overview: Real estate broker Ryan Serhant and his wife, Emilia Bechrakis, gut their newly acquired 7,900-square-foot townhouse, located in Brooklyn, N.Y., to create the home of their dreams with enough room for everyone in their large Greek family. In each episode, viewers will see the transformation of the constantly evolving townhouse, with more than a few hiccups along the way. Ryan and Emilia deal with unforeseen setbacks, including construction delays, familial drama and cost overruns, as they experience making a house into a home.

episodes.name: My Big Fat Greek Renovation
episodes.overview: When Ryan and Emilia embark on the renovation of a historic 8,000-square-foot Brooklyn brownstone in Boerum Hill, they stumble upon a host of structural problems; Emilia's boisterous Greek family wants to insert their opinions into the process.

episodes.name: Over Budget and Under Lockdown
episodes.overview: When New York City's pandemic restrictions stall progress, Ryan and Emilia suffer devastating cost overruns; while struggling to manage his prankster brother-in-law and overbearing father-in-law, Ryan receives a surprise offer for the house.

episodes.name: The Despina Dilemma
episodes.overview: As Ryan and Emilia scramble to childproof their vast six-floor brownstone, Emilia's live-in mother throws the couple's design plan into disarray by demanding a costly bedroom switch; Ryan hustles to find a renter for his SoHo condo.

episodes.name: Brownstone Milestone
episodes.overview: Ryan and Emilia pack their condo and feel nostalgic; as the renovation comes to an end, the team of top interior designers installs the new custom furnishings
